Record.Synonym: RIMA (Reversible Inhibitor of Monoamine Oxidase A)
Record.Description: A chemically heterogeneous group of drugs that have in common the ability to block oxidative deamination of naturally occurring monoamines. (From Gilman, et al., Goodman and Gilman's The Pharmacological Basis of Therapeutics, 8th ed, p414)RIMA shows preference for the A isoenzyme
